channel.title: HTML on Dope| It's Our blog
channel.description: Recent content in HTML on Dope| It's Our blog

item.title: Acute stress disease
item.description: Types of ASD Sympathetic (also recognised as ‘combat or flight’ response) Sympathetic Acute Stress Disorder is because of the release of excessive adrenaline and norepinephrine into the worried system.

item.title: ශ්‍රී ලංකාවේ බුද්ධාගම
item.description: Emphasis ඉතිහාසය වංශකථාවලට අනුව, අශෝක අධිරාජ්‍යයාගේ පුත්‍රයා වූ මහින්ද තෙර විසින් ක්‍රි.
